title: ICE "index out of bounds" in `xform_self_ty`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Found with a [modified fuzz-rustc](https://github.com/jruderman/fuzz-rustc)

### Code

```rust
trait Dancer {
    fn dance(&self) -> _ {
        self.dance()
    }
}

fn main() {}
```

### Error output

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 0 but the index is 0', [compiler/rustc_hir_typeck/src/method/probe.rs:1790](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/1eb62b1235fd77200e6bd967d70e83c0f2497233/compiler/rustc_hir_typeck/src/method/probe.rs#L1790)

<details><summary>Full output (two ICEs with backtraces)</summary>

```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md

note: rustc 1.67.0-nightly (1eb62b123 2022-11-27) running on x86_64-apple-darwin

end of query stack
thread panicked while panicking. aborting.
Abort trap: 6
```

</details>

### Regression

Regression in nightly-2022-08-18, somewhere in rollup 9c20b2a8cc7588decb6de25ac6a7912dcef24d65. I suspect #100389 (@compiler-errors)

### Version

```
rustc 1.67.0-nightly (1eb62b123 2022-11-27)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 1eb62b1235fd77200e6bd967d70e83c0f2497233
commit-date: 2022-11-27
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.67.0-nightly
LLVM version: 15.0.4
```
